_links.description: A list of links for possible actions related to this endpoint.

self.description: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) for this endpoint.

paye.description: PAYE income details per employment for an individual for the requested time period.

income.description: The list of payments for each employment in the requested period.

taxYear.description: The tax year of submission in format: YYYY-YY

hasPartner.description: Indicates if the employee has a partner.

id.description: Identifier assigned by the employer to the individual. Pattern: ^[^ ].{0,34}$

payFrequency.description: The frequency of payments. W1 Weekly, W2 Fortnightly, W4 Four weekly, M1 Monthly, M3 Quarterly, M6 Bi-annually, MA Annually, IO One off, IR Irregular

weekPayNumber.description: The number corresponding to the week the payment was made. As pay dates may not align with calendar weeks, the range of permitted values is 1 through to 54 (inclusive), and 56.

monthPayNumber.description: The number between 1 and 12, corresponding to the month the payment was made. As the tax year starts in April, so does the monthPayNumber, with 1 corresponding to April.

paymentDate.description: The payment date. Date in the format: YYYY-MM-DD

paidHoursWorked.description: The number of normal hours worked. Pattern: ^[^ ].{0,34}$

taxCode.description: The tax code associated with the payment. Pattern: ^([1-9][0-9]{0,5}[LMNPTY])|(BR)|(0T)|(NT)|(D[0-8])|([K][1-9][0-9]{0,5})$

taxablePayToDate.description: The taxable pay in this pay period including payrolled benefits to date in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

taxablePay.description: Taxable pay in this pay period including payrolled benefits in kind in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

totalTaxToDate.description: The total tax to date in this employment in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

taxDeductedOrRefunded.description: The value of tax deducted or refunded from this payment in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

dednsFromNetPay.description: The value of deductions from net pay in pay period in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

employeePensionContribs.description: Details about the employee's pension contributions.

paidYTD.description: The value of employee pension contributions to date in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

notPaidYTD.description: The value of employee pension contributions that are not paid under a net pay arrangement in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

paid.description: The value of the employee pension contributions paid under net pay arrangements in the pay period in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

notPaid.description: The value of employee pension contributions that are not paid under a net pay arrangement in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

statutoryPayYTD.description: A set of properties relevant to statutory pay for the year to date

maternity.description: The value for maternity pay in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

paternity.description: The value for paternity pay in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

adoption.description: The value for adoption pay in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

parentalBereavement.description: The value for parental bereavement pay in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

grossEarningsForNICs.description: Details about gross earnings for National Insurance contributions.

inPayPeriod1.description: The value in pay period 1 in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

inPayPeriod2.description: The value in pay period 2 in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

inPayPeriod3.description: The value in pay period 3 in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

inPayPeriod4.description: The value in pay period 4 in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

totalEmployerNICs.description: Details about total employer National Insurance contributions.

inPayPeriod1.description: The value in pay period 1 in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

inPayPeriod2.description: The value in pay period 2 in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

inPayPeriod3.description: The value in pay period 3 in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

inPayPeriod4.description: The value in pay period 4 in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

ytd1.description: The value year to date 1 in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

ytd2.description: The value year to date 2 in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

ytd3.description: The value year to date 3 in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

ytd4.description: The value year to date 4 in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

employeeNICs.description: Details about the employee's National Insurance contributions due on all earnings.

inPayPeriod1.description: The value in pay period 1 in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

inPayPeriod2.description: The value in pay period 2 in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

inPayPeriod3.description: The value in pay period 3 in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

inPayPeriod4.description: The value in pay period 4 in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

ytd1.description: The value year to date 1 in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

ytd2.description: The value year to date 2 in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

ytd3.description: The value year to date 3 in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

ytd4.description: The value year to date 4 in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99
